review_title: Interesting take on the FNAF genre.
one_reviews_text:
My Quick thoughts:
An interesting take on the Five Nights At Freddies type genre, but set in a mine. The scale is off, you feel like a giant but the initial jump scares are cool and the mines have a great atmosphere. I made it to level 2 in my video. (I believe there are only 5 levels?) 
All in all not a bad little game for the price of a bag of chips.

1st Impressions Video with Commentary // Oculus Rift S // GTX 1060 (6GB):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1MxjmlqFrgc
(Please Note: Links might not work from Oculus so please search YouTube for 'Paradise Decay VR Horror Nights Story')
